author: Justin Wise
title: Federal inmates to be confined to cells for two weeks amid coronavirus outbreak
description: Federal prison inmates will be confined to their cell or quarters for the next two weeks as part of efforts to stem the spread of the coronavirus, the Federal Bureau of Prisons...
content:
Federal prison inmates will be confined to their cell or quarters for the next two weeks as part of efforts to stem the spread of the coronavirus, the Federal Bureau of Prisons annonced on Tuesday.
The agency said in a press release that the decision came in… [+2635 chars]
